Articles.Content:
If any of you remember playing that classic PC game "Terminal Velocity" (a Terminal Reality/3D Realms game), then you might remember this particular ship... the TV-202.

This is what the ship looks like in the game's box art

Now this is my version of that ship. All stock parts. It finally occurred to me that I had to think outside the box where Kerbal Space Program is concerned.... This is as close to the original design I could get.... due to its long ventral fin, I had to place the ship on "trolley". I also added solid rocket boosters and increased the ship's angle of attack so it can get off the ground.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Craft file: http://www./view/sbk7jpxx4tb5mvq/TV-202.craft

I'm seeing pattern here, that people are more likely to recognize the "bread-and-butter" type craft...
That's a nice looking ship! I'll give it a spin once I've got the time.
